articles.title: OAN reporter Chanel Rion showed up to Trump rally in OSU shirt - The Oklahoman
articles.description: Just days after OSU football coach Mike Gundy called the OAN Network disgusting, one of their reporters showed up in Tulsa in an OSU shirt.

articles.author: Li Cohen
articles.title: Yankees and Mets will train in New York, not Florida, Cuomo announces - CBS News
articles.description: The news comes after the MLB decided to temporarily close all spring training facilities in Florida and Arizona for cleaning.
articles.content:
The Yankees and Mets will resume training for the 2020 MLB season on their home turf "for the first time in years," New York Governor Andrew Cuomo announced Saturday.
